title: Deebo's Trade Request
description:
Field, Marcus, RC, Schefter, and Darlington discuss Deebo Samuel’s trade request, MacAdoo’s turn of face on Sam Darnold, the wide receiver market, and Tua’s upcoming make it or break it season.
